title: Matchmaking
body: Do you guys also think that Riots matchmaking is  very bad? I know in 90% of the games whether i win or whether i lose. And then i get onto 10 game losing or winning streak only because of matchmaking ? Thats not very much fun and should be improved -.-

replies.body:
Same thing is happening to me right now, also to alot of other players i talked to.
Matchmaking seems way to random.
ya matchmaking completely broken in game modes other than ranked.
Deutsches Forum, deutsche Sprache. Got it?

Ranked matchmaking is very fair (most of the time), no complaints about that.

I wish I had a higher Normal-MMR, trying to push it atm but still get matched with way lower guys.
Well, maybe things will get better after I am in a lead of 200+ wins in my W/L.
Just read in the forums ... Riot explains it
